in_brief: Dr. S. Anandhi currently holds the position of Associate Professor, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, India. Her professional career has been with PSG College of Technology since 2007. Her teaching interests include Software Patterns, Semantic Web, Computer Forensics, Web Analytics, Secure Coding, Identity and Access Management, and Object Computing. She received her Ph.D. in Computer Science, with the thesis “AN INVESTIGATION AND DESIGN OF CERTAIN RFID SECURITY PROTOCOLS FOR CLOUD BASED SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT APPLICATIONS” from Anna University. Her research interests include Access control, Security protocols and Formal methods. She has been a reviewer in the IEEE Systems Journal, Journal of Super Computing, Wireless Personal Communications, IETE Journal of  Research, IEEE Access, IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing and in several conferences for proceedings. She is a recognized supervisor at Anna University for Ph.D. /  MS research scholars  (Ref. No. 3970030). She has published several research papers in reputed  International journals and conferences.
